statements: SELECT customer_id, feedback, preference FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE preference = 'positive';
SELECT feedback, customer_id FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 456 AND preference = 'negative';
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE preference = 'positive';
SELECT feedback, customer_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT preference FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY preference ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 5 AND preference != 'negative';
SELECT customer_id, feedback, preference FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY preference, customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, style_preference FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, size_preference FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, style_preference, color_preference FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE size_preference='Large';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT style_preference, color_preference FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE size_preference = 'M';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE size_preference IN ('S', 'L') AND color_preference = 'Blue';

SELECT customer_id, style_preference, size_preference, color_preference FROM CustomerPreferences JOIN CustomerFeedback ON CustomerPreferences.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id ORDER BY CustomerFeedback.rating DESC, CustomerPreferences.size_preference ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_name, product_id, recommendation_date FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, recommendations.product_id FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, rating, comments FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, rating, comment FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT Feedback.feedback_id, Feedback.feedback_text, Products.product_name FROM Feedback INNER JOIN Products ON Feedback.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, r.rating FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id INNER JOIN Products p ON f.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN Recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE f.rating > 3 ORDER BY c.last_name ASC;

SELECT o.order_id, c.first_name AS customer_first_name, c.last_name AS customer_last_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC, o.order_date ASC;
